name: responsivefighte2e
description: This project includes the end-to-end tests for UNSW SLP Module

scripts.test.e2e: set NODE_ENV=test&&cd e2e && rimraf output && codeceptjs run --debug --grep @wip --invert
scripts.test.multi: set NODE_ENV=test&&cd e2e && rimraf output && codeceptjs run-multiple --all
scripts.reportgen: cd e2e/ &&  allure generate output --clean -o allure-report
